subject: ftp.br.d.o out of service
body:
We've lost our mirror due to combined disk crashes... We're replacing
the failed ones but it'll take a while to download the mirror again.
We'll tell you when it's back on line.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
